args.description: args to the task, ie. 123, "hello world" or [456, "my string"]

tasks.description: Additional task inputs as a JSON array, if desired, i.e. [{'endpoint':'...', 'function':'...', 'args':[...], 'kwargs':{...}}]

kwargs.description: kwargs to the task, ie. {"first": 123, "second": "my string"}

osprey-worker-endpoint.description: The endpoint UUID that has the osprey library

user-endpoint.description: The endpoint UUID that user has provided for their function to run on

user-function.description: The function UUID, ie from client.register_function()

database-commit-function.description: The function UUID that is used for commiting to database

download-function.description: The function UUID that downloads and passes files to the next stage
